data.question: What is the main purpose of using adenine in biomimetic MOFs for CO2 photoconversion?
data.answer: The main purpose of using adenine in biomimetic MOFs for CO2 photoconversion is to achieve efficient CO2 photoreduction through a unique o-amino-assisted activation at the aromatic nitrogen atom of adenine molecules.
